TextBody:
Hello Kevin,

My name is Ramon with Netwrix Technical Support and I have been assigned to this case. What are your available days and times to schedule a remote session with you this week or next? Please include your time zone. 

Also before we meet in this remote session, will you please create a snapshot of your current EPP Appliance?

We will assist you in upgrading to EPP 5.9.4.2, after we run a few checks on your current system. 

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Np16T:ref
Subject: ADV-2025-010 vulnerability notice.    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Np16T:ref ]
